publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-722.2 Rhona Brankin: Early Years and Early Interventionâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-722) in the name of Adam Ingram, insert at end "notes the failure of the SNP Government to provide a statement on its commitment to reduce class sizes to 18 in primary 1 to primary 3 by 2011, as called for by the Parliament on 13 September 2007, and agrees that the Scottish Government should bring forward detailed plans and costings on its commitment to reduce class sizes within the imminent strategic spending review statement."
